participant_1.background:
I'm not sure if I'm good at keeping up with my family, but I try my best to stay in touch with them.
I am a person who is happy with my hobbies and I am not too concerned about what others think of me.
I don't mind the weather as long as I can listen to VNV Nation.
I don't really care about the weather.
i am a ballet dancer.

participant_2.background:
I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.
I like to relax by looking through my antique collection.
I like to go on websites about cats and fashion.
i ride a unicycle.
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.

content.text: Hi, I am a ballet dancer. Do you have any hobbies?
Hi, I used to go to the library a lot more often but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.
I see, do you enjoy reading?
Yes, I do. It helps me relax and it is a great way to learn new things.
That's great, what kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but my favorites are historical fiction and romance novels.
I see, I like to read historical fiction too. Do you have any favorite authors?
I like to read books by Mary Balogh and Philippa Gregory. What about you, do you have any favorite authors?
I like to read books by Ken Follett and Bernard Cornwell.
I have heard good things about their books. I will have to check them out.
You should, they are both great authors.
